about_the_game:
ATOYO - A TAVERN OF YOUR OWN!

Atoyo is a tavern decoration game inspired by TTRPG parties and their eventual homes or bases of operations, where the party gathers and displays trophies, discusses battle plans, and live and train while not on the road.

The intent with Atoyo is for the players to be able to decorate their tavern to their whims with the items provided, should they want a typical fantasy style tavern they can do that, in later updates there will be additions to make the taverns layout to your specifications should you want to add rentable rooms, or additional floor space for patrons and eventually change the over all theme to match different peoples and places as the player wishes.

Update will happen periodically though I cannot say for certain how frequent, the aim is for one a month minimum that will include general bug fixes but more importantly new items and options for the players to decorate with.
